original_text: The man who is the most tender and refined among you will begrudge food to his brother, to the wife he embraces, and to the last of the children whom he has left,
korean_text: 너희 중에 온유하고 연약한 남자까지도 그의 형제와 그의 품의 아내와 그의 남은 자녀를 미운 눈으로 바라보며

sentences.original_text: The man who is the most tender and refined among you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 가장 연약하고 세련된 사람은

sentences.original_text: will begrudge food to his brother,
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 형제에게 음식을 아끼게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and to the last of the children
